description:
The Kedora is out of control, and Koji must team up with Baron Ashura in order to take out the ancient soldier. But they find themselves confronted with the past, and bear witness to the day Mycenae ended.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Joint Struggle! Travel to the dangerous Past!
Kyoutou! Kiken na Kako e no Tabi!
共闘! 危険な過去への旅!
